bibl.title: Settlement of a Debt and Extracts from Census Registers.
bibl.note: Copy of a settlement (cession) between the brothers Gaius Sempronius Priscus and Marcus Sempronius Vestinus (July 3, A.D. 121), and three excerpts from census registers (A.D. 117/8 and 131/2). All four documents may have been made in connection with a matter unknown to us. Karanis, after (July 10,) A.D. 138.
bibl.seg: SIJPESTEIJN P.J., Settlement of a Debt and Extracts from Census Registers.
ZPE 98 (1993) pp. 283-291, 1 arbre généal. et pl. XVI b.

Copy of a settlement (cession) between the brothers Gaius Sempronius Priscus and Marcus Sempronius Vestinus (July 3, A.D. 121), and three excerpts from census registers (A.D. 117/8 and 131/2). All four documents may have been made in connection with a matter unknown to us. Karanis, after (July 10,) A.D. 138.
